thread.title: Michael Phelps Starbucks GOAT Fitness
thread.title_full: Michael Phelps Starbucks GOAT | POPSUGAR Fitness

author: Dominique Astorino
title: Michael Phelps Starbucks GOAT Fitness
text:
Though many of us have had a unique spelling of our name delivered to us on the side of a Starbucks cup, Michael Phelps got a particularly surprising nickname on his quad-shot (OK, Michael) latte today in four little letters.
A post shared by Michael Phelps (@m_phelps00) on Mar 20, 2017 at 11:11am PDT
Related:
90+ Gold-Medal-Worthy Photos of Michael Phelps's Adorable Baby Boy
Michael said the GOAT nickname "made us all laugh" when he shared it on his Instagram. We agree that though it isn't his given name, it's still equally appropriate. Can we just say though, while it's hilarious that Michael's wife, Nicole, got a cup with "Wife of GOAT" written on the side (apparently she thought it was funny, too!), maybe the next barista can give Michael a cup with "Husband of Miss California" on it.
Image Source: Getty / Al Bello
